name: OpportunityContactRole
description: Represents the role that a Contact plays on an Opportunity.
summary: The {OpportunityContactRole} object in Salesforce is used to represent the role of a contact in relation to a specific opportunity. It contains information such as the contact's role, level of influence, and their relationship to the opportunity. This object helps sales teams track and manage the involvement of contacts in the sales process.
label: Opportunity Contact Role
